articles.title: Biden, Trudeau charting different paths at Summit of the Americas - CTV News
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden and Prime Minister Justin Trudeau are charting markedly different paths today at the Summit of the Americas. Before his leader-level meetings get underway, Biden is sitting down to tape an appearance with talk-show host Jimmy Kimmel. …
articles.content:

articles.author: Rebecca Morin, USA TODAY
articles.title: Biden's Summit of the Americas gets off to rocky start with Mexico's boycott. What to expect. - USA TODAY
articles.description: Mexican President López Obrador's decision to boycott the summit meeting has upended the agenda, which Biden hoped to center on migration and climate.
articles.content: WASHINGTON – President Joe Biden’s Summit of the Americas will get off to a rocky start this week after Mexico's president announced he would not attend the gathering, a major snub for a high-profile… [+6491 chars]
